scripts.build: yarn build:cargo && yarn build:wasm-bindgen && yarn build:wasm-opt && yarn build:web
scripts.build:wasm-opt: wasm-opt pkg/andrews_chess_engine_bg.wasm -o pkg/andrews_chess_engine_bg.wasm-opt.wasm -O && mv pkg/andrews_chess_engine_bg.wasm-opt.wasm pkg/andrews_chess_engine_bg.wasm || yarn build:wasm-opt-note
scripts.build:wasm-opt-note: echo 'NOTE: Since wasm-opt could not be found (or it failed), the resulting module might not perform that well, but it should still work.'
